dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1179 IS: Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heinrich introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To name the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Las Cruces, New Mexico, the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act.

section.header: Name of Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Las Cruces, New Mexico

subsection.text: The community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Las Cruces, New Mexico, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic.

Any reference in any law, regulation, map, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the clinic referred to in subsection (a) shall be considered to be a reference to the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic.
